text: 3.12 Ais 62.2, 65.15, Ese 48.35, Gal 2.9, 4.26, Hib 12.22, Lep 14.1, 21.2 Bɨ an kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl penpen gɨnɨgab ak, God nop gen, God agnɨgep kal awl kal meg awl olap tek mɨdɨl nɨm, yokɨp okok ma gɨ ajenɨgab agak. Wak adek nop ak, God yad ak yɨb nop ak tɨkɨl, man awl ne Jelusalem kɨdeyɨl ak yɨb tɨkɨl gɨnɨgayn agak. God yad ak man awl ne Jelusalem anɨb ak, God agek man ne alaŋ nɨb lum awl ownɨgab agak. Yɨb yad kɨdeyɨl ak abe, wak adek nop ak tɨkɨnɨgayn agak.
